description: The New York Times Best Sellers are up-to-date and authoritative lists of the most popular books in the United States, based on sales in the past week, including fiction, non-fiction, paperbacks, children’s books, audiobooks, graphic books and more.
title: Hardcover Fiction
title_page: Hardcover Fiction Books - Best Sellers - Books - Jan. 3, 2021
maintext:
29 weeks on the list
THE VANISHING HALF
by Brit Bennett
Riverhead
The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
